Wamenag: Pemahaman Agama Komprehensif Cegah Berkembangnya Radikalisme
03 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Wakil Menteri Agama Zainut Tauhid menyebut pentingnya kerukunan antarumat beragama. Kerukunan umat beragama hingga pemahaman menyeluruh tentang agama dapat mencegah berkembangnya paham radikalisme.
"Kita semua wajib menyadari kerukunan di antara kita merupakan modal yang sangat berharga bagi kelangsungan hidup masyarakat Indonesia," kata Zainut di Jalan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Hal ini disampaikan Zainut dalam acara HUT ke-55 tahun Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI). Zainut menghadiri acara ini mewakili Menteri Agama (Menag) Fachrul Razi.
"Agar kerukunan antar umat beragama tetap terjaga perlu kesadaran berfikir para pemeluk agama masing-masing dengan pemahaman modernisasi beragama yang komprehensif umat beragama akan dapat mencegah berkembangnya radikalisme dan ekstremisme," ujar Zainut.
Menurutnya, kerukunan merupakan modal awal kelangsungan hidup masyarakat Indonesia. Kerukunan itu bisa berlangsung baik jika masyarakatnya memiliki pemahaman yang menyeluruh mengenai agama masing-masing.
"Saya ingin ingatkan lagi pentingnya kebersamaan dalam keberagaman, kehidupan berbangsa, bernegara. Kita harus memiliki kesadaran berkehidupan berbangsa dan bernegara," jelas Zainut.

(sam/dkp)

Deputy Minister of Religion: Comprehensive Understanding of Religion Prevents Radicalism
03 Nov 2019, 10:47 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Deputy Minister of Religion Zainut Tauhid mentioned the importance of inter-religious harmony. Religious harmony to a comprehensive understanding of religion can prevent the development of radicalism.
"We all must realize that harmony between us is a very valuable capital for the survival of the Indonesian people," said Zainut on Jalan MH Thamrin, Central Jakarta, Sunday (11/03/2019).
This was conveyed by Zainut in the 55th anniversary of Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia's (NSI) event. Zainut attended this event representing the Minister of Religion (Menag) Fachrul Razi.
"In order for harmony between religious communities to be maintained, awareness of the thinking of followers of their respective religions with a comprehensive understanding of religious modernization of religious communities will be able to prevent the development of radicalism and extremism," said Zainut.
According to him, harmony is the initial capital for the survival of the Indonesian people. Harmony can take place well if the people have a thorough understanding of their respective religions.
"I want to remind you again the importance of togetherness in diversity, national and state life. We must have an awareness of national and state life," explained Zainut.

(sam / dkp)
